alert.note: Alert for Gillespie; Kendall; Kerr (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 16 at 6:26PM CDT until June 16 at 7:15PM CDT by NWS Austin-San Antonio
info.description: The National Weather Service in Austin San Antonio has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Eastern Kerr County in south central Texas... Southeastern Gillespie County in south central Texas... Northwestern Kendall County in south central Texas... * Until 715 PM CDT. * At 625 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Fredericksburg, moving east at 5 mph. HAZARD...Two inch hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Fredericksburg, Blumenthal, Luckenbach, Cain City, Old Tunnel State Park, Grapetown, Rocky Hill and Bankersmith. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
